name: fallaway
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
In basketball, a fallaway shot is one made when moving backwards away from the basket (= an open net hanging from a metal ring through which players try to throw the ball to score points for their team): She won the game with a fallaway jump shot in the final seconds. A fallaway bank shot took him over the 30-point mark for the game.
More examplesFewer examplesHe just missed with a fallaway jumper from inside the free throw line.
